channel.title: kulupu Aponi on lipu kule
channel.description: Recent content in kulupu Aponi on lipu kule

item.title: nasin kulupu li seme?
item.description: toki. mi kulupu Aponi. jan mute li sona ala e ‘kulupu’ ni; mi wile pana e sona pi nasin ni mi. ‘nasin kulupu’ li seme? kulupu pi toki pona la, jan mute li sama ni: ona li taso ala lon lawa ona, li kulupu pi sijelo sama. nasin pi kulupu ni li mute; kulupu tu li ken pilin ante mute tawa nasin kulupu ona, li ken ante mute. ni taso li nasin kulupu: jan li taso ala lon lawa.
